type PointerIcon = class inherit Object interface IParcelable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: Represents an icon that can be used as a mouse pointer.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Android.Views.PointerIcon? Create (Android.Graphics.Bitmap bitmap, float hotSpotX, float hotSpotY);
.method public static hidebysig class Android.Views.PointerIcon Create(class Android.Graphics.Bitmap bitmap, float32 hotSpotX, float32 hotSpotY) cil managed
static member Create : Android.Graphics.Bitmap * single * single -> Android.Views.PointerIcon

Docs.param: The X offset of the pointer icon hotspot in the bitmap. Must be within the [0, bitmap.getWidth()) range.
The Y offset of the pointer icon hotspot in the bitmap. Must be within the [0, bitmap.getHeight()) range.
Docs.summary: Creates a custom pointer icon from the given bitmap and hotspot information.
Docs.returns: A pointer icon for this bitmap.
